overview:
Oren Raviv is a Senior Analyst at IDC’s Emerging Technology group, where he covers the Internet, mobile and telecom sectors, looking for promising start-ups and interesting trends.

As part of his job, Oren also partakes in the group’s quarterly M&A report, IDC’s main coverage of IT-related buyouts.

Prior to IDC, Oren was the co-founder of Gamebit, one of the first mobile games developers in Israel. Prior to that, Oren was the editor for WIZ magazine, a local gaming and digital culture centered publication.
